landing.bio: I am a B.Tech 3rd year student at VIT Vellore.Currently I am learning applications of Machine Learning.I use reactJS for front-end development.I am also doing some competitive coding for interview preparations

experience.aboutWork: I was working as a junior React JS developer.My work was mostly related to developing static pages using reactJS and bootstrap.
I was part of technical team in a student chapter at VIT,mainly dealing with web development.
At the same student chapter,I was doing design also.

interests.paragraphOne: I like to explore new domains from time to time.Like making games in unity or doing creative work in photoshop.This way,you will always keep finding something exciting to keep yourself busy with.
interests.paragraphTwo: Other than that,my hobbies are to visit new places in vacations and playing video games.I am a huge space nerd.
